title: Reusser’s GC Win in Burgos Puts Vollering on Notice for Tour de France Femmes
content:
Marlen Reusser returns to form with commanding GC victory at Vuelta a Burgos Féminas: 'A beautiful return to time trialing.'

Read the full article at Reusser’s GC Win in Burgos Puts Vollering on Notice for Tour de France Femmes on Velo.
author: ahood
